mapper.select: select bo.no, bo.title, bo.hit, to_char(bo.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') regDate, bo.user_no as userNo, us.name as writer from board bo left join users us on bo.user_no = us.no order by bo.no asc

select bo.no, bo.title, bo.content, bo.hit, to_char(bo.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') regDate, bo.user_no as userNo, us.name writer from board bo left join users us on bo.user_no = us.no where bo.no = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into board values (seq_board_no.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, default, sysdate, #{userNo} )
